description.value: If Lady Vol takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn't function on her next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

+23 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+23 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 necrotic damage.

At-Will

Standard

Area burst 1 within 20

+21 vs Fortitude; 2d8+7 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of Lady Vol's next turn.

At-Will ✦ Fear

Standard

Area burst 3 within 10

Targets two creatures in burst; +21 vs Will; 2d8+7 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Healing, Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

Targets living creatures; +21 vs Reflex; 4d8+7 necrotic damage, and Lady Vol regains 5 hit points for every creature damaged in this manner.

At-Will

Standard

Close burst 5

Three of Lady Vol's allies in the burst can each make a basic attack.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied

Lady Vol's drain life ability recharges, and she uses it.

Trigger: When reduced to 0 hit points

Lady Vol's body and possessions crumble into dust, but she is not destroyed. She reappears (along with her possessions) in 1d10 days within 1 square of her phylactery, unless the phylactery is also found and destroyed.

system.biography:
HP 356; Bloodied 178
Regeneration 10
Resist 10 necrotic Vulnerable radiant (if Lady Vol takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn’t function on her next turn) Immune disease, poison 		Init +11 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 35Fort 31Ref 34Will 35
Speed 6, fly 7 (clumsy)
Ability ScoresStr 12 (+10)
Con 18 (+13)		Dex 14 (+11)
Int 24 (+16)		Wis 16 (+12)
Cha 22 (+15)
Languages Common, Draconic, Elven
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +24, Bluff +19, Diplomacy +22, History +21, Insight +17, Religion +21Senses Darkvision,Low-light vision
Passive Perception 22 | Insight 27
